table.item_view_global: View and edit global sub items

item.name: Item Name
item.use_global_item: Use data of an existing global item (optional)
item.use_global_item_control_list: Link up with an existing global
item.valid_url: You can use this as a friendly url
item.invalid_url: This url is invalid or already been taken by another page
item.select_site_tip: You must first select the site before selecting the template to create a page
item.select_template_ta: Type here to search for template
item.select_category: Type a new category name or search for an existing one
item.select_parent_page: Type to search and select the parent page (if any)
item.select_target_control: Select a control that will be created as a list
item.select_target_control_desc: System will create a list by using this object structure as an item template. You can select another control by clicking delete icon and select a new one
item.select_target_global: Select a global that inherit the control named
item.select_target_global_desc: Globals in the list above are the ones that are in the same site and using the same control as this control list items. You can select another global by clicking delete icon and select a new one.
item.manage_control_list_desc: Click this button to manage the control list (option value)
item.control_list_tip: Please note that if you change the control type, all existing value of this property will be removed
item.control_item_count: {{ itemNumber }} item(s) in the list now
item.no_control_item: No item in the list, please add at least one item
item.control_list_pagination_desc: System will recognize this element as a pagination component, however, you need to contact developers, so they could implement and make this element to appear as the pagination in the web page.

user.name: Fullname
user.valid_email: You can use this email as a username
user.invalid_email: This email has already been taken, please choose another email!
user.role_tip: * Administrator can register a new user as Editorial level only.

permissions.label: Allowed User
permissions.tip_1: Leave this field blank if you want to allow every editorial-level users access this item
permissions.tip_2: * Please note that administrator-level user will be able to access every items.

property_type.desc_dropdown: Dropdown type selected, please specify item value and text for this property
property_type.ddl_item_desc: Please enter both item text and value
property_type.no_element_selected: You have no element to assign a value of this property, please click below button to select some element.
property_type.placeholder_textbox: Please enter the value of this property
property_type.placeholder_dropdown: Please select the value of this property
property_type.text_data_type: Choose the type of data in the text element
property_type.number_text_type: Number (both number and decimal are allowed)
property_type.radio_desc: Please add at least two radio items
property_type.allowed_format_desc: You can specify allowed file format to upload for this property. If you want to allow more than one extension, please put comman(,) as a seperator e.g. .jpg,.JPEG,.png

dropdown.name: Dropdown List
dropdown.desc: Create a list of choices as a dropdown element

checkbox.name: Checkbox
checkbox.desc: You can create one or more checkbox items

text.name: Textfield
text.desc: <small class="block">Create a property for single line plain text data or apply the following helpers.</small><small class="block">Colorpicker, URL Selector</small>
text.helper_custom_url_tip: Both internal and external url are available. An external url should begin without slash or one of the following formats: http://, https:// or www (eg. http://cms.com, https://secure.com or www.cms.com). An internal url can be started with or without slash (/).
text.ext_url_note: Or enter an external URL below. Please note that the external URL value will be used if the value is not empty even the page has been selected.
text.ext_url_tip: The external url should be a valid url (start with http://, https:// or www)

radio.name: Radiobutton
radio.desc: Create a list of choices with allows only single selection

radio_list.name: Radiobutton List
radio_list.desc: Create a list of choices with allows only single selection

multiline_text.name: Multiline Textbox
multiline_text.code_format: Make this element as a script format style?
multiline_text.code_format_tip: * Script style will be rendered with a monospace font (consolas, courier new  etc.) which is the best way to display the scripts
multiline_text.desc: A text element that allows to enter the multiple line of text

richtext.name: Richtext Editor
richtext.desc: A special widget that allow to create rich text content
richtext.maxlength_cap: Max length {{ maxlength }} characters (only characters count). If there is an empty line at the end of content, it will be considered as one character.

file_upload.name: File Uploader
file_upload.desc: Create a property as a file upload element
file_upload.max_image_size_fixed: Due to the performance of the website, the system will allowed only {{ max_image_size }}KB maximum file size for the image.
file_upload.dimension_tip: Leave the blank value to accept any dimension of image
file_upload.ratio_tip: Enter image ratio (e.g. 16:9, 4:3) for your image or leave it blank to accept any image ratio. If ratio is specified, image will be checked if it matches the ratio before checking the dimension
file_upload.any_dimension: An image with any width and height is allowed
file_upload.only_width_assigned: An image with maximum {{ width }}px width and any height is allowed
file_upload.only_height_assigned: An image with maximum {{ height }}px height and any width is allowed
file_upload.width_height_assigned: An image with maximum {{ width }}px width and {{ height }}px height is allowed

datetime.name: Datetime Picker
datetime.desc: Create a property with as a datetime picker feature
datetime.date_only_desc: You can enter only a date value with this option. Default format is DD/MM/YYYY or you can specify your own format below.
datetime.time_only_desc: You can enter only a time value with this option. Default format is hh:mm:ss (24H) or you can specify your own format below.
datetime.datetime_desc: You can enter both date and time value with this option. Default format is DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm:ss (24H) or you can specify your own format below.
datetime.datetime_formatter: Type to find the datetime format item

control_list.name: Control List
control_list.desc: Create a property as a list of control object
control_list.ctrl_list_tip: Please note that value of some element types (e.g. image, radiobutton, dropdown, checkbox) in the control list type can be modified at the default value mode only

map_coord.name: Map Coordinate
map_coord.desc: Create a property that allow you to select coordinate directly from the map

typeahead.no_item_add_new: No matched item found, press Enter to add current value

error.404: Sorry, the page you tried to access does not exist in our application.

tooltip.user_active: This user is active, click to inactivate this user
tooltip.user_inactive: This user is inactive, click to activate this user
tooltip.page_item_option_active: This page item option is active
tooltip.page_item_option_inactive: This page item option is inactive
tooltip.global_item_option_active: This global item option is active
tooltip.global_item_option_inactive: This global item option is inactive
tooltip.status_change_not_allowed: Sorry, you cannot change active status of your own account
tooltip.website_tip: The current site you are working on

dashboard.no_dashboard_items: Looks like you have no website in the system yet, please have your administrator create one now in a structure mode before starting the site content management

image.dimension_incorrect: Selected image dimension is too large. Please select another image with maximum {{ width }} width and {{ height }} height
image.image_appearance_warning: This image does not match the specified image requirement, its dimension might be too large or its ratio is incorrect. You can perform image processing if you want to use this image or choose another one that match the requirements.
image.multiple_files_warning: * You have selected more than one file to upload all at once. This operation will skip all image check and cropping process (if one or more of your selected files is image) and you have to select the file you want to use manually after uploading has completed.

misc.make_url_field: Make this as URL value (apply url selection assistant to this element)

language.lang_name: Or you can enter you preferred name
language.language_tip_1: Tips: Drag and drop to reorder languages, number above each item is a language display priority of the website.
language.language_tip_2: Tips: Double click on language item to edit, click the last item to add a new language
language.duplicated_item_error: The specified language is already exists in the server, please select another language
language.lang_order_failed: Failed to save new order of language list
language.main_language_tip: * Please note that all other languages will be automatically set to secondary language if this option is true
language.main_language_notify: This is the current main language, changing active status is disabled
language.default_language_notify: This is the the default language, changing active status is disabled

search.res_page_item_option: Found in Page: {{ page_name }} > Page Item: {{ page_item_name }}

file_upload.filename_duplicate: The specified filename has already been taken in the same directory
file_upload.file_delete_confirm: This operation cannot be undone after this and deleting item may cause not found issue if the file has been using or being reference in the webpage. Do you really want to delete {{file_count}} file(s) from this directory?

alert.exceed_translate_text_limit: Cannot add more items. It's about to exceed the character limit, has {{ available }} characters left. {{ average }} is an average character length.
